title: Baked Tandoori Chicken Tikka
description: Smoky and flavorful chicken tikka pieces, baked instead of grilled for a healthier take.

ingredients.name: boneless, skinless chicken breast or thighs
paprika or Kashmiri red chili powder

instructions.description: In a bowl, combine yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice, tandoori masala, paprika/Kashmiri chili powder, turmeric, cumin, coriander, garam masala, and salt. Mix well to form the marinade.
Add the chicken cubes to the marinade and coat them thoroughly. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or preferably 4-6 hours (or overnight).
Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with foil or parchment paper and lightly grease it.
Thread the marinated chicken pieces onto skewers (if using, soak wooden skewers first) or arrange them in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, turning halfway through. Chicken should be cooked through and slightly charred at the edges.
Optional: For a smokier flavor, you can broil for the last 2-3 minutes, watching carefully to prevent burning.
Brush lightly with oil after removing from the oven.
Serve hot with onion and lemon wedges, and mint chutney.
